event.description: Alex Gordon strikes out swinging.
Mike Moustakas flies out to right fielder Max Kepler.
Lorenzo Cain walks.
Eric Hosmer grounds into a force out, fielded by shortstop Jorge Polanco. Lorenzo Cain out at 2nd.
Salvador Perez lines out to left fielder Danny Santana.
Brandon Moss grounds out, second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Paulo Orlando strikes out swinging.
Alcides Escobar grounds out, shortstop Jorge Polanco to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Raul Mondesi strikes out swinging.
Alex Gordon called out on strikes.
Mike Moustakas singles on a line drive to right fielder Max Kepler.
Lorenzo Cain grounds into a force out, pitcher Kyle Gibson to second baseman Brian Dozier. Mike Moustakas out at 2nd. Lorenzo Cain to 1st.
Eric Hosmer grounds into a double play, first baseman Joe Mauer to shortstop Jorge Polanco to pitcher Kyle Gibson. Lorenzo Cain out at 2nd.
Salvador Perez homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Brandon Moss strikes out swinging.
Paulo Orlando walks.
Alcides Escobar doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Danny Santana. Paulo Orlando scores on the throw.
Raul Mondesi flies out to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Alex Gordon grounds out, second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Mike Moustakas homers (2) on a fly ball to right field.
